sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_todos (todo_no, category_no, todo_title, user_no, todo_expected_date, todo_content) values (todos_seq.nextval, #category.no#, #title#, #user.no#, #expectedDate#, #content#)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from comm_todos where todo_deleted = 'N'

select A.todo_no as"no", A.category_no as"category.no", B.category_name as"category.name", A.todo_title as"title", A.todo_expected_date as"expectedDate", A.todo_status as"status", A.todo_created_date as"createdDate" from (select row_number()over (order by todo_no desc) num, todo_no, category_no, todo_title, todo_expected_date, todo_status, todo_created_date
from comm_todos
where todo_deleted = 'N') A, comm_todo_categories B
where num between #begin# and #end# and A.category_no = B.category_no order by A.todo_no desc
